title: The Best Silent Keyboards for Open Offices
description: Don't be 'that guy' with the loud clicky keyboard. Here are the best silent options that still feel great.
author: Free Online Typing Team
content:
Silent Switches

Look for 'Silent Red' or 'Silent Brown' switches. They have internal rubber dampeners.

O-Rings

A cheap mod. Place small rubber rings on keycap stems to dampen the bottom-out sound.

Top Pick

Logitech MX Keys S (Membrane) or Keychron K Pro with Silent Red switches.
